notes: Bootstrap placeholder; update once verified against official survey documentation.

variables.name: selfage
variables.label: Respondent age in years (self-reported)
variables.notes: Verify legal adult age filter and trim obvious outliers.

variables.name: gendermale
variables.label: Binary indicator: 1=identifies as male
variables.notes: Derived from categorical gender item; confirm treatment of non-binary selections.

variables.name: classchild
variables.label: Self-described childhood socioeconomic class
variables.notes: Treat as ordered factor for trend tests; document recodes for robustness.

variables.name: h33e6gg
variables.label: Happier as adult than childhood (Likert)
variables.notes: Reverse-coded items suffixed with -neg; this item is positively oriented.

variables.name: npvfh98
variables.label: Tends to suffer from anxiety (negative orientation)
variables.notes: Higher scores indicate higher anxiety; consider reverse-coding for wellbeing composites.

variables.name: mds78zu
variables.label: Parents verbally/emotionally abused respondent ages 0-12
variables.notes: Potential trauma exposure; apply disclosure controls when tabulating.

variables.name: wz901dj
variables.label: Tends to suffer from depression
variables.notes: Combine with anxiety for mental health index after reliability checks.

variables.name: networth
variables.label: Current net worth bracket
variables.notes: Categories encoded as ordinal integers; align with original survey labels.
